text: Curious how you approach Mega Menus.  Do you build in HTML?  Custom Module?  What expectations for edit-ability do you set with your Marketer?

I've had the best luck building out mega menus with HTML and including it as a partial. Here's some documentation on the Menu function: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions#menu>
